text: Mbuli ayo ikala kilaguso kwa Waizilaeli kamba munhu heli mulava nhosa, ndio kulonga halawa muulelo wa Haluni sikuyachole hana uupango wa nhosa na kusoma ubani kuulongozi wa Mndewa Imulungu. Ama sivo kokomigwa kamba Kola na wayage. Ago gose gatendigwa kamba Mndewa Imulungu viyamulagize Eleazali kubitila Musa.
